summary_teim: Robert Palmer speaks about Robert Johnson. John Hammond is inducted with a Lifetime Achievement Award. Fats Domino is inducted by Billy Joel. The Everly Brothers are inducted by Neil Young.
summary_ssm: Robert Palmer speaks about Robert Johnson. John Hammond is inducted with a Lifetime Achievement Award. Fats Domino is inducted by Billy Joel. The Everly Brothers are inducted by Neil Young.
contents_teim: Robert Palmer speaks -- Ahmet Ertegun inducts John Hammond and accepts award on his behalf -- Jann Wenner introduces clip of "Bluberry Hill" performed by Fats Domino (partially shown) -- Jann Wenner introduces Billy Joel -- Billy Joel inducts Fats Domino -- Fats Domino speaks -- Ahmet Ertegun speaks about Everly Brothers, introduces clip (not shown) -- Ahmet Ertegun introduces Neil Young -- Neil Young inducts Everly Brothers
contents_ssm: Robert Palmer speaks -- Ahmet Ertegun inducts John Hammond and accepts award on his behalf -- Jann Wenner introduces clip of "Bluberry Hill" performed by Fats Domino (partially shown) -- Jann Wenner introduces Billy Joel -- Billy Joel inducts Fats Domino -- Fats Domino speaks -- Ahmet Ertegun speaks about Everly Brothers, introduces clip (not shown) -- Ahmet Ertegun introduces Neil Young -- Neil Young inducts Everly Brothers

abstract_ssm: This is footage from the Rock & Roll Hall of Fame induction ceremony on January 23, 1986. Robert Palmer inducts Robert Johnson -- Ahmet Ertegun inducts John Hammond and accepts award on his behalf -- Jann Wenner introduces Fats Domino -- Billy Joel inducts Fats Domino -- Fats Domino acceptance speech -- Ahmet Ertegun introduces Everly Brothers -- Neil Young inducts Everly Brothers
name_sim: Rock and Roll Hall of Fame Foundation
contributors_ssm: Rock and Roll Hall of Fame Foundation
